comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- Your caption here is erroneous. Roosevelt is not departing, he is landing in Rio, and being welcomed here on his arrival by his Brazilian hosts. The word used by Bain is "Debarking," which means disembarking -- not departing.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Wystan:  Thanks for catching this typo.  We'll fix it next time we update.
